meaning: She is the one who grants boons; She is Varalakshmi.
commentary: In the process of worshipping Her through ‘मनोन्मणि (‘Manonmaṇi) siddhi’ She is known as Varadā. This worship grants tremendous purity of speech (vak shuddhi), the gift of speaking effectively and powerfully (vak siddhi and vak shakti). These are the true boons; hence She is Varadā.
